Text:
Why put windows software into a mac diskimage ?

Can be opened / extracted in Windows with 7zip:
http://www.7-zip.org/
@BigNoise: apple provides Windows software on their iOS dev channel in DMG disk images, which is strange, but a fact.
Aplle provides Windows versions in ZIP files, not DMG files
dmayan: I downloaded it straight from the Apple DEV center. iModzone etc provide ZIP files, Apple used to provide DMGs. Unsure they still do, but they did.
